channel.title: The Midnight Muse
channel.description: Recent content on The Midnight Muse

item.title: About
item.description: “Midnight Muse Is an ongoing visual project by @herlifeinpixels to capture the fleeting emotions of the night time. Prints available.”

item.title: My First Post
item.description: The city melts into a seductive glow. Colours dance in still moments. After a while I can’t tell whether the hues come from my synesthesia, or from the refractions of the scratches on my glasses. Ah midnight, when reality and imagination blends into one. Like a muse, it beckons me to come.
